name: open_navigation_drawer
description: Open the navigation drawer to access additional options or settings.

name: select_tab
description: Select a specific tab to navigate to its corresponding section.
parameters: {'tab_name': 'Which tab do you want to select? ["Photos", "Search"]'}

name: view_photo
description: View a specific photo from the displayed collection.
parameters: {'photo_description': "Which photo do you want to view? (e.g., 'Photo taken on Aug 6, 2025 9:29:50 AM')"}

name: long_click_photo
description: Perform a long click on a photo to access additional options like sharing or deleting.
parameters: {'photo_description': "Which photo do you want to long-click? (e.g., 'Photo taken on Aug 6, 2025 9:29:50 AM')"}

name: sign_in
description: Initiate the sign-in process to access account-specific features.

name: open_camera
description: Open the camera application to take a new photo.

name: take_photo
description: Take a new photo using the camera.
